title: Customer connects to community through democratic business gathering spaces
description: Customer connects to community through democratic business gathering spaces
content:
Scenario: Customer connects to community through democratic business gathering spaces
    Given neighborhood lacks accessible community gathering spaces
    And Ms. Johnson experiences isolation common to many residents
    When democratic businesses serve as community hubs beyond commercial function
    Then she attends community events at Maria's Kitchen (harvest dinners, neighborhood meetings)
    And meets neighbors at senior meal program building social networks
    And participates in community organizing using business space after hours
    And democratic business becomes social infrastructure combating isolation
    And community_elohim coordinates community programming at democratic business spaces
